https://docs.python.org/2/library/platform.html#platform.version  <= does not seem to be kernel but release version.

You might want to use `platform.uname` instead

```platform.release()``` return the release name but the fact is named ```kernel``` so I follow this way. ```Kernel``` seems to be more user friendly that ```release``` no ?

The fourth ```platform.uname()``` field is exactly the same that ```platform.version()```.
